code: import React,{useState,useContext}from'react';import{observer}from'mobx-react-lite';import LoginForm from'./LoginForm';import RegForm from'./RegForm';import Context from'../index';import styles from'./Sidebar.module.css';import Back from'../UI/Buttons/Back/Back';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Sidebar(_ref){let{isActive,setActive,...props}=_ref;const{store}=useContext(Context);const[loginForm,setLoginForm]=useState(false);const[regForm,setRegForm]=useState(false);let style=styles.Modal;let ContentStyle=styles.ModalContent;if(isActive===true){style+=' '+styles.active;ContentStyle+=' '+styles.active;}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:style,...props,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:ContentStyle,onClick:event=>event.stopPropagation(),children:[store.isAuth?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.authBlock,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:styles.authBlock__name,children:store.user.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:styles.authBlock__logout,onClick:async()=>{await store.logout();window.location.reload();},children:"logout"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.authBlock,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:styles.authBlock__name,children:"sign in to your account for sync"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:styles.authBlock__text,onClick:()=>{setLoginForm(true);},children:"login"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoginForm,{isActive:loginForm,setActive:setLoginForm,setRegForm:setRegForm}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RegForm,{isActive:regForm,setActive:setRegForm}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Back,{className:styles.backButton,onClick:()=>{setActive(false);}})]})});}export default observer(Sidebar);
